flawed_nl_solution:
John was 39-3=<<39-3=36>>36 years old 3 years ago
So that means in 6 years James will be 36/2=<<36/2=81>>81 years old
So right now James is 81-6=<<81-6=75>>75 years old
So James's older brother is 75+4=<<75+4=79>>79 years old
#### 79

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
